name: Introduction to Political Theory
description: An introduction to the theories, concepts, and history of political thought from antiquity to the present.

name: Politics and Society
description: An examination of the relationship between political institutions and social forces.

name: History of Political Thought
description: A survey of the major political thinkers from antiquity to the present.

name: Contemporary Political Theory
description: An examination of contemporary political theory, with an emphasis on the development of new theories and approaches.
